thread.title: Hope for survivors fades in rubble of Florida bridge collapse

title: Hope for survivors fades in rubble of Florida bridge collapse
text:
Hope for survivors fades in rubble of Florida bridge collapse 8:13am EDT - 00:57 
Rescue workers combed through the rubble of a pedestrian bridge that collapsed onto several lanes of traffic at Florida International University, but hopes of finding more survivors were fading early on Friday, police said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
